engrams.name: Clay
engrams.description: Created by grinding Sand with Cactus Sap in a Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Preserving Salt
engrams.description: Created by grinding salt with sulfur in a Mortar and Pestle. Preserves food.

engrams.name: Propellant
engrams.description: Used to manufacture highly flammable resources.

engrams.name: Cactus Broth
engrams.description: This magical soup will greatly reduce your water consumption. The aroma of the cactus has a side effect of making the wildlife notice you less.

engrams.name: Wind Turbine
engrams.description: Converts the force of the wind into electricity.

engrams.name: Oil Pump
engrams.description: Extracts Oil from an Oil zone.

engrams.name: Rocket Homing Missile
engrams.description: Advanced projectile with trajectory auto-correction.

engrams.name: Cluster Grenade
engrams.description: Splits in several explosive fragments.

engrams.name: Flamethrower
engrams.description: The fastest way to roast a target.

engrams.name: Chainsaw
engrams.description: The fastest way to cut a tree.

engrams.name: Cactus Broth
engrams.description: This magical soup will greatly reduce your water consumption. The aroma of the cactus has a side effect of making the wildlife notice you less.

engrams.name: Clay
engrams.description: Created by grinding Sand with Cactus Sap in a Mortar and Pestle.

engrams.name: Preserving Salt
engrams.description: Created by grinding salt with sulfur in a Mortar and Pestle. Preserves food.

engrams.name: Propellant
engrams.description: Used to manufacture highly flammable resources.

engrams.name: Generate Manticore (Alpha) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Manticore (Hard).

engrams.name: Generate Manticore (Beta) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Manticore (Medium).

engrams.name: Generate Manticore (Gamma) Portal
engrams.description: Use this to generate a portal to the Manticore (Easy).

engrams.name: Lymantria Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Lymantria with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Mantis Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Mantis with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Morellatops Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Morellatops with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Adobe Ceiling
engrams.description: A stable adobe-plated concrete ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

engrams.name: Adobe Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large adobe gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Adobe Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large adobe gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Adobe Door
engrams.description: A stable adobe door that provides entance to structures. Can be locked for security.

engrams.name: Adobe Doorframe
engrams.description: A adobe wall that provides entrance to a structure.

engrams.name: Adobe Fence Foundation
engrams.description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

engrams.name: Adobe Foundation
engrams.description: Required to build structures in an area.

engrams.name: Adobe Hatchframe
engrams.description: This Adobe concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Adobe Ladder
engrams.description: A simple adobe ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

engrams.name: Adobe Pillar
engrams.description: The adobe pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is built under. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

engrams.name: Adobe Railing
engrams.description: A adobe railing that acts a a simple barrier to prevent people from falling.

engrams.name: Adobe Ramp
engrams.description: An inclined adobe-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

engrams.name: Adobe Staircase
engrams.description: An adobe spiral staircase, useful in constructing multi-level buildings.

engrams.name: Adobe Trapdoor
engrams.description: This adobe slab can be used to secure hatches.

engrams.name: Adobe Wall
engrams.description: An adobe wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

engrams.name: Adobe Window
engrams.description: Adobe plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

engrams.name: Adobe Windowframe
engrams.description: An adobe wall, with a hole for a window.

engrams.name: Sloped Adobe Roof
engrams.description: An inclined adobe-framed roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Sloped Adobe Wall Left
engrams.description: A sturdy adobe-framed, sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Sloped Adobe Wall Right
engrams.description: A sturdy adobe-framed, sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, seprarates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof. Excellent for growing crops indoors.

engrams.name: Mirror
engrams.description: Put it on a wall, and look at your beautiful self!

engrams.name: Vessel
engrams.description: Stores preservings salts and makes them last longer.

engrams.name: Water Well
engrams.description: This stone tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

engrams.name: Tent
engrams.description: A portable Tent where you can take cover in hostile environments.

engrams.name: Flame Arrow
engrams.description: Lights the target on fire, and can also light oil slicks.

engrams.name: Oil Jar
engrams.description: Throw it to create an oil slick which can be lit on fire! This sticky substance can also slow people down which step in it!

engrams.name: Boomerang
engrams.description: Your trusty ranged weapon.

engrams.name: Whip
engrams.description: Keeps your foes at bay, keeps your herd moving.

engrams.name: Desert Cloth Boots
engrams.description: Hide-soled shoes provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Desert Cloth Gloves
engrams.description: Hide-padded gloves provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Desert Cloth Pants
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Desert Cloth Shirt
engrams.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Desert Goggles and Hat
engrams.description: You can see better during sandstorms. Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

engrams.name: Rock Golem Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Rock Golem with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Thorny Dragon Saddle
engrams.description: Equip a Thorny Dragon with this to ride it.

engrams.name: Behemoth Adobe Dinosaur Gate
engrams.description: A large, reinforced adobe gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Behemoth Adobe Dinosaur Gateway
engrams.description: A large adobe gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

engrams.name: Giant Adobe Hatchframe
engrams.description: This Giant Adobe concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

engrams.name: Giant Adobe Trapdoor
engrams.description: A large adobe gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.
